text: Christopher James Adler (born November 23, 1972) is an American musician. He is best known for making the band Lamb of God. He played drums for the band until 2019. Adler won a Grammy Award when he played with Megadeth in 2016. The award was for the band's album released the same year named Dystopia. He went on tour with the band after the album was released, but left Megadeth to keep playing with Lamb of God. Adler plays a drum set made for people who are right-handed, but he is left-handed. == References == Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Megadeth members
